languages.text: {n}Взгляд Ардженты, обращенный на вас, полон осуждения.{/n} "Я не воспротивлюсь тебе, Вольный Торговец, пусть душа моя и требует изничтожить эту нечисть. Но я буду ждать, когда она даст мне повод. Я буду ждать с нетерпением".

{n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Ардженты, обращенный на вас, полон осуждения.{/n} "Я не воспротивлюсь тебе, Вольный Торговец, пусть душа моя и требует изничтожить эту нечисть. Но я буду ждать, когда она даст мне повод. Я буду ждать с нетерпением".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔严厉地盯着你，目光中满是谴责之意。{/n}“我不会违背你的命令，行商浪人，但我的灵魂此刻正迫不及待想铲除这只肮脏的怪物。我会等着它亲自把破绽送上门来。我殷切地盼望着。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔严厉地盯着你，目光中满是谴责之意。{/n}“我不会违背你的命令，行商浪人，但我的灵魂此刻正迫不及待想铲除这只肮脏的怪物。我会等着它亲自把破绽送上门来。我殷切地盼望着。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta te lanza una mirada acusadora.{/n} «No me opondré a usted, Comerciante Independiente, aunque mi alma clame por la destrucción de esta vil criatura. Pero aguardaré la más mínima excusa que me dé. Aguardaré con impaciencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta te lanza una mirada acusadora.{/n} «No me opondré a usted, Comerciante Independiente, aunque mi alma clame por la destrucción de esta vil criatura. Pero aguardaré la más mínima excusa que me dé. Aguardaré con impaciencia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta vous adresse un regard désapprobateur.{/n} « Je ne m'opposerai pas à vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, même si mon âme m'enjoint de détruire ce parasite. J'attendrai simplement qu'il me donne une raison de le faire. Je saurai me montrer patiente. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta vous adresse un regard désapprobateur.{/n} « Je ne m'opposerai pas à vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, même si mon âme m'enjoint de détruire ce parasite. J'attendrai simplement qu'il me donne une raison de le faire. Je saurai me montrer patiente. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas intensiver Blick ist voll von Verdammung.{/n} "Ich werde mich Euch nicht widersetzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, auch wenn sich meine Seele danach verzehrt, diesen Abschaum loszuwerden. Aber ich warte nur darauf, dass er mir einen Grund dafür gibt. Und ich werde geduldig warten."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas intensiver Blick ist voll von Verdammung.{/n} "Ich werde mich Euch nicht widersetzen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, auch wenn sich meine Seele danach verzehrt, diesen Abschaum loszuwerden. Aber ich warte nur darauf, dass er mir einen Grund dafür gibt. Und ich werde geduldig warten."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたを見つめるアルジェンタの視線は非難に満ちている。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、私はあなたに逆らうつもりはない。たとえ私の魂がこの汚らわしいものの滅亡を切望しようとも。だが、私はそれが私に大義を与えるのを待っている。待ち望んでいるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたを見つめるアルジェンタの視線は非難に満ちている。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、私はあなたに逆らうつもりはない。たとえ私の魂がこの汚らわしいものの滅亡を切望しようとも。だが、私はそれが私に大義を与えるのを待っている。待ち望んでいるのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, kınama dolu bakışlarını sana dikiyor.{/n} "Her ne kadar ruhum, bu menfur yaratığın yok oluşu için haykırsa da sana karşı koymayacağım Hür Tacir. Bana bir neden verene dek bekleyecek, büyük bir hevesle bekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's gaze upon you is full of condemnation.{/n} "I will not oppose you, Rogue Trader, though my soul may clamour for the destruction of this foul thing. But I will wait for it to give me cause. I will wait eagerly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın sana diktiği bakışları kınamayla dolu.{/n} "Her ne kadar ruhum, bu menfur yaratığın yok oluşu için haykırsa da sana karşı koymayacağım Hür Tacir. Ancak bana bir neden verene dek bekleyecek. Ben de büyük bir hevesle bekleyeceğim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
